LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.label: Warrior
LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.description: Those with the Warrior factor excel in close combat. However, they are not good at research and work.

LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.label: Berserker
LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.description: Those with the Warrior factor excel in close combat. However, they are not capable of long-range attacks.

LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.label: Knight
LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.description: It is a wall that protects everyone from remote attacks. However, they are not good at research and work.

LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.label: Ranger
LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.description: Rangers are good at setting traps and attacking from a distance. However, they are not good at working.

LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.label: Wizard
LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.description: It can be used as an offensive force, from small lacerations to explosions. However, its FP durability is low.

LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.label: MeatMaker
LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.description: MeatMaker is individuals that accumulate more meat than regular LittleFairy.

LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.label: Healer
LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.description: It will be able to perform minor wound healing. However, it will not be good at fight.

LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.label: Worker
LittleFairy_Race.SkillStyleDef.description: The Worker is responsible for assisting in the overall work of the colony. However, at the cost of reduced combat capability.
